title: IHG: See Positive Travel Trends in Europe & Middle East
description: Elie Maalouf, CEO of InterContinental Hotels Group, discusses the company’s strong financial performance in 2025. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that IHG is well prepared for the World Cup, which adds to the company’s optimism for 2026. (Source: Bloomberg)
